leaf_cluster_name: 生信-系统发育与进化生态
task_chain: 比对→建树→模型选择→比较分析→可视化

tools.name: Abalign
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization software for antibody multiple sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool specifically designed for antibody multiple sequence alignments, aiding in the analysis of sequence conservation and variability in immunological studies.

tools.name: Phylogenetic-Analysis-and-Protein-Sequence-Alignment-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for protein sequence alignment and phylogenetic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python pipeline integrating Biopython and Clustal Omega for protein sequence alignment, distance matrix calculation, and phylogenetic tree construction (UPGMA & NJ) with visualization capabilities.

tools.name: figleaf_fasta
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to mask, exclude, or extract FASTA sub-sequences
tools.detailed_description: A command-line utility for manipulating FASTA files, offering functionality to hard or soft mask sequences, as well as exclude or extract specific sub-sequences based on criteria.

tools.name: AliView
tools.one_line_profile: Intuitive and fast software for aligning, viewing, and editing DNA/amino acid sequences
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and fast graphical interface for viewing and editing multiple sequence alignments. It supports large datasets and provides features for manual alignment adjustment.

tools.name: GateKeeper
tools.one_line_profile: Fast alignment filter for DNA short read mapping
tools.detailed_description: A hardware-accelerated (FPGA) pre-alignment filter designed to rapidly discard dissimilar DNA sequences before performing expensive sequence alignment, improving the speed of read mapping.

tools.name: Chorus
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous GPU+CPU multiple protein sequence alignment search
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance tool for searching large databases using multiple protein sequence alignment, leveraging heterogeneous computing (GPU+CPU) to accelerate the process.

tools.name: ProSeqViewer
tools.one_line_profile: Library to visualize sequences and multiple sequence alignments (MSA)
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript library for embedding and visualizing protein sequences and multiple sequence alignments in web applications, supporting interactive exploration of alignment data.

tools.name: ish
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-based filtering CLI tool
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for filtering sequences based on alignment criteria, likely used for quality control or selecting specific sequences from larger datasets.

tools.name: Iterative_masking
tools.one_line_profile: Iterative masking algorithm on MSA Transformer for synthetic sequence generation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of an iterative masking algorithm using MSA Transformers to generate synthetic protein sequences that preserve evolutionary statistics.

tools.name: Phylogeny-MSA-Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Code for analyzing phylogenetic relationships using protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing methods to demonstrate how protein language models trained on MSAs learn phylogenetic relationships, useful for evolutionary inference tasks.

tools.name: Scrooge
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance pairwise sequence aligner based on GenASM
tools.detailed_description: A fast and accurate pairwise sequence aligner that utilizes the GenASM algorithm, optimized for both CPU and GPU architectures to accelerate sequence alignment tasks.

tools.name: Shifted-Hamming-Distance
tools.one_line_profile: Filtering mechanism for sequence alignment using Shifted Hamming Distance
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Shifted Hamming Distance (SHD) algorithm, which serves as a pre-alignment filter to quickly identify and discard dissimilar sequence pairs.

tools.name: Shouji
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate pre-alignment filter for banded sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A pre-alignment filtering tool designed to accelerate banded sequence alignment calculations by reducing the search space for alignment algorithms.

tools.name: SneakySnake
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient pre-alignment filtering algorithm for CPU, FPGA, and GPU
tools.detailed_description: A highly efficient pre-alignment filtering algorithm capable of running on modern CPU, FPGA, and GPU architectures to expedite sequence alignment for both short and long reads.

tools.name: coati
tools.one_line_profile: Codon-aware multiple sequence alignments
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing multiple sequence alignments that explicitly considers codon structure, improving alignment accuracy for coding sequences.

tools.name: ncGTW
tools.one_line_profile: Profile alignment by neighbor-wise compound-specific graphical time warping
tools.detailed_description: An R package for aligning profiles (likely LC-MS or similar time-series data) using a graphical time warping approach with misalignment detection, useful in metabolomics or proteomics.

tools.name: catsequences
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for concatenating multiple FASTA alignments
tools.detailed_description: A utility designed to concatenate multiple FASTA alignment files into a supermatrix, a common preprocessing step for phylogenomic analyses.

tools.name: PoincareMSA
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of multiple sequence alignments using Poincaré maps
tools.detailed_description: A tool for visualizing and interpreting multiple sequence alignments by projecting them onto Poincaré maps, aiding in the detection of hierarchical organization and evolutionary relationships.

tools.name: block-aligner
tools.one_line_profile: SIMD-accelerated library for adaptive block-based sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance library for computing global and X-drop affine gap penalty sequence alignments using SIMD instructions and an adaptive block-based algorithm.

tools.name: infernal
tools.one_line_profile: RNA secondary structure and sequence profile alignment and search
tools.detailed_description: A standard tool for searching DNA sequence databases for RNA structure and sequence similarities using covariance models (CMs).

tools.name: msa4u
tools.one_line_profile: Simple visualization tool for Multiple Sequence Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight tool designed for the visualization of multiple sequence alignments, facilitating quick inspection of alignment results.

tools.name: JBrowseMSA
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple sequence alignment viewer for JBrowse
tools.detailed_description: A plugin or component for JBrowse that enables the visualization of multiple sequence alignments within the genome browser context.

tools.name: clustal-omega
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple sequence aligner for protein and DNA/RNA
tools.detailed_description: A widely used general-purpose multiple sequence alignment program for proteins and DNA/RNA, known for its scalability to large datasets.

tools.name: mafft
tools.one_line_profile: High-speed multiple sequence alignment program
tools.detailed_description: A popular and efficient multiple sequence alignment program offering various methods for accuracy and speed, suitable for both nucleotide and amino acid sequences.

tools.name: openhdemg
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for the analysis of HD-EMG recordings
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed for the processing and analysis of High-Density Electromyography (HD-EMG) data, useful in physiological and biomechanical research.

tools.name: SeqPig
tools.one_line_profile: Hadoop/Pig library for distributed analysis of large sequencing datasets
tools.detailed_description: SeqPig is a library for Apache Pig designed for the distributed analysis of large sequencing datasets. It provides import and export functions for common sequencing file formats (SAM, BAM, FASTQ, QSEQ) and a collection of Pig UDFs to process aligned and unaligned sequence data.

tools.name: USeq
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive suite of Java tools for NGS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of over 180 Java applications for analyzing next-generation sequencing data, covering ChIP-Seq, RNA-Seq, Bisulfite-Seq, and DNA-Seq. Includes tools for variant annotation, filtering, alignment QC, and file manipulation for IGV/UCSC.

tools.name: ClipKIT
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment trimming algorithm for phylogenomic inference
tools.detailed_description: ClipKIT is a multiple sequence alignment (MSA) trimming algorithm designed to maintain phylogenomic data integrity. It aims to improve the accuracy of phylogenetic inference by removing phylogenetically uninformative sites while retaining informative ones.

tools.name: PhyKIT
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for processing and analyzing multiple sequence alignments and phylogenies
tools.detailed_description: PhyKIT is a UNIX shell toolkit and Python library for processing and analyzing multiple sequence alignments (MSAs) and phylogenetic trees. It provides a suite of commands for calculating alignment properties, tree properties, and performing data manipulation.

tools.name: DLC-SLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Robust LiDAR-SLAM system with learning-based denoising
tools.detailed_description: DLC-SLAM is a LiDAR-SLAM system that integrates a learning-based denoising module and a loop closure detection module. It is designed to perform robust simultaneous localization and mapping in challenging environments.

tools.name: FG-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for large-scale LiDAR point cloud understanding
tools.detailed_description: FG-Net (Feature-Geometric Network) is a deep learning framework designed for fast and accurate understanding of large-scale LiDAR point clouds. It leverages feature-geometric interactions for tasks such as semantic segmentation.

tools.name: Ribosome Profiling Analysis Framework
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for analyzing ribosome profiling data
tools.detailed_description: A PHP-based analysis framework for ribosome profiling data, supporting alignment, triplet periodicity analysis, and detection of Open Reading Frames (ORFs). Developed by LUMC.

tools.name: sarlacc
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analyzing nanopore sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: An R package pipeline designed to analyze nanopore sequencing data. It performs adapter trimming, UMI retrieval, read clustering, and consensus sequence generation via multiple sequence alignment.

tools.name: MuscleMap
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for whole-body quantitative MRI of muscle
tools.detailed_description: An open-source initiative and toolset for the analysis of whole-body quantitative Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) of muscle tissue. It facilitates the extraction of muscle parameters for biomedical research.

tools.name: myoconverter
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for OpenSim musculoskeletal models to MuJoCo
tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert OpenSim 4.0+ musculoskeletal (MSK) models into MuJoCo format. It optimizes muscle kinematics and kinetics to ensure accurate simulation in the MuJoCo physics engine.

tools.name: sobolev_alignment
tools.one_line_profile: Sobolev alignment of deep probabilistic models for single cell profiles
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the alignment of deep probabilistic models used in comparing single-cell profiles. It utilizes Sobolev alignment techniques to handle distributional shifts in single-cell data.

tools.name: Mask4D
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end mask-based 4D panoptic segmentation for LiDAR
tools.detailed_description: Mask4D is an end-to-end framework for 4D panoptic segmentation of LiDAR sequences. It segments point clouds in both space and time, providing instance-level understanding for robotics and autonomous systems.

tools.name: FASconCAT-G
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for concatenating and editing sequence alignments
tools.detailed_description: FASconCAT-G is a tool for editing and concatenating multiple nucleotide, amino acid, and structure sequence alignment files. It supports various formats (FASTA, CLUSTAL, PHYLIP) and provides functions for sequence renaming, translation, and consensus generation for phylogenetic analysis.

tools.name: openEMSstim
tools.one_line_profile: Open-hardware module for controlling EMS/TENS stimulation
tools.detailed_description: openEMSstim is an open-hardware module designed to adjust the intensity of EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation) and TENS stimulators via software control. It is used in HCI and physiological research to programmatically control muscle stimulation.

tools.name: BuscoOrthoPhylo
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for BUSCO-based phylogenetic tree construction
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper script pipeline that automates the process of concatenating, aligning, and constructing phylogenetic trees from BUSCO orthologs. It streamlines the phylogenomic workflow for BUSCO datasets.

tools.name: astar-pairwise-aligner
tools.one_line_profile: A pairwise sequence aligner using the A* algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A pairwise sequence aligner written in Rust that utilizes the A* algorithm to find optimal alignments between biological sequences. It is designed for performance and correctness in sequence comparison tasks.

tools.name: filterSAM
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to filter SAM/BAM files by identity and coverage
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool designed to filter SAM and BAM alignment files based on percent identity and the percentage of matched sequence. It facilitates quality control and refinement of sequence alignment data.

tools.name: phylommand
tools.one_line_profile: Software package for phylogenetic tree and alignment manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A software package designed to create, manipulate, and analyze phylogenetic trees or pairwise alignments. It provides command-line utilities for evolutionary biology tasks.

tools.name: SISRS
tools.one_line_profile: Site Identification from Short Read Sequences
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline that identifies phylogenetically informative sites from next-generation whole-genome sequencing data of multiple species. It enables homologous site identification without requiring de novo assembly or annotation.

tools.name: PyProt
tools.one_line_profile: Library for protein structure alignment and profiling
tools.detailed_description: A set of libraries designed for aligning, profiling, and predicting the structure of proteins. It supports tasks related to structural biology and protein analysis.

tools.name: ACES
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Conservation and Evolutionary Selection
tools.detailed_description: A workflow to query small sequences in a large set of genomes. It generates BLAST results, multiple sequence alignment files, graphical fragment assembly files, and phylogenetic tree files for evolutionary analysis.

tools.name: kalign
tools.one_line_profile: Fast multiple sequence alignment program
tools.detailed_description: A fast and accurate multiple sequence alignment program designed for biological sequences. It is optimized for handling large datasets and provides efficient alignment solutions.

tools.name: TWILIGHT
tools.one_line_profile: High throughput tool for tall and wide multiple sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A high-throughput bioinformatics tool designed for performing multiple sequence alignments on datasets that are both tall (many sequences) and wide (long sequences).

tools.name: msa
tools.one_line_profile: R package for multiple sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides a unified interface to popular multiple sequence alignment algorithms like ClustalW, ClustalOmega, and MUSCLE, enabling sequence analysis within the R environment.

tools.name: Body-and-Organ-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: CT scan segmentation tool for body composition analysis
tools.detailed_description: A medical imaging tool that combines TotalSegmentator and Body Composition Analysis to segment CT scans. It identifies structures such as bones, muscles, organs, and blood vessels for medical research and analysis.

tools.name: RNAcode
tools.one_line_profile: Detecting protein coding genes in multiple sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A program to detect protein-coding regions in a set of homologous nucleotide sequences (Multiple Sequence Alignment) by analyzing evolutionary signatures associated with coding sequences.

tools.name: XPRESSpipe
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for Ribosome Profiling and RNA-seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An automated alignment and analysis pipeline designed for Ribosome Profiling (Ribo-seq) and RNA-seq data. It handles preprocessing, alignment, and quantification tasks.

tools.name: ggmsa
tools.one_line_profile: Visualizing multiple sequence alignment using ggplot2
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides functions for visualizing multiple sequence alignments (MSA) using the ggplot2 framework, allowing for publication-quality figures of sequence data.

tools.name: ProGraphMSA
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based multiple sequence alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art multiple sequence alignment tool that produces phylogenetically sensible gap patterns. It uses a graph-based approach to maintain robustness against errors in the guide tree and allows for alternative splicings.

tools.name: musclesyneRgies
tools.one_line_profile: R package to extract muscle synergies from electromyogram data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing electromyogram (EMG) data to extract muscle synergies, used in physiology and neuroscience research.

tools.name: vcf2msa
tools.one_line_profile: Convert multi-sample VCF files to multiple sequence alignments
tools.detailed_description: A utility to convert variant call format (VCF) files containing multi-sample data into multiple sequence alignment (MSA) format, facilitating phylogenetic analysis from variant data.

tools.name: pyfamsa
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for FAMSA multiple sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: Cython bindings for FAMSA, an algorithm designed for ultra-scale multiple sequence alignments, providing a Python interface for high-performance alignment tasks.

tools.name: pymuscle5
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for MUSCLE v5 multiple sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: Cython bindings and Python interface to MUSCLE v5, a highly efficient and accurate multiple sequence alignment software.

tools.name: pytrimal
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for trimAl alignment trimming tool
tools.detailed_description: Cython bindings and Python interface to trimAl, a tool for automated alignment trimming to remove poorly aligned regions, optimized with SIMD.

tools.name: rich-msa
tools.one_line_profile: Terminal viewer for Multiple Sequence Alignments
tools.detailed_description: A Rich renderable for viewing Multiple Sequence Alignments directly in the terminal, aiding in quick visualization and inspection of alignment data.

tools.name: pseqsid
tools.one_line_profile: Calculate pairwise sequence identity in MSAs
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate pairwise sequence identity, similarity, and normalized similarity scores of proteins within a multiple sequence alignment.

tools.name: biostructmap
tools.one_line_profile: Map sequence alignment data onto protein structures
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for mapping sequence aligned data (e.g., evolutionary rates, population genetics metrics) onto 3D protein structures.

tools.name: pydustmasker
tools.one_line_profile: Identify and mask low-complexity regions in DNA
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for identification and masking of low-complexity regions in nucleotide sequences, often used as a preprocessing step for alignment.

tools.name: tcrBLOSUM
tools.one_line_profile: Specialized substitution matrix for TCR alignment
tools.detailed_description: A specialised amino acid substitution matrix for T-cell receptors (TCRs) to enable sensitive alignment of distant TCRs, improving upon standard BLOSUM62.

tools.name: aligner-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable sequence alignment in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of sequence alignment methods (like Needleman-Wunsch) with helpers for PyTorch, enabling differentiable alignment for machine learning applications in biology.

tools.name: pagan2-msa
tools.one_line_profile: PAGAN2 multiple sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: PAGAN2 is a multiple sequence alignment tool, an evolution of the PAGAN aligner, designed for phylogenetic placement and alignment extension.

tools.name: prank-msa
tools.one_line_profile: PRANK multiple sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: PRANK is a probabilistic multiple alignment program for DNA, codon and amino-acid sequences, known for its accuracy in evolutionary analysis.

tools.name: Utensils
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for concatenating alignments and renaming terminals
tools.detailed_description: A set of simple scripts for manipulating phylogenetic data, specifically for concatenating sequence alignments and renaming terminal nodes in trees.

tools.name: diamond
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated BLAST compatible local sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: A high-throughput program for aligning DNA and protein sequences against a protein reference database, significantly faster than BLAST.

tools.name: BBTools
tools.one_line_profile: Suite of fast, multithreaded bioinformatics tools
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive suite of bioinformatics tools for DNA/RNA analysis, including BBMap (aligner), BBDuk (trimmer), and BBMerge, widely used for NGS data processing.

tools.name: clustalo-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for Clustal Omega
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper around Clustal Omega, a standard tool for multiple sequence alignment, enabling integration into Python workflows.

tools.name: Sequoya
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective metaheuristics for MSA
tools.detailed_description: A tool for solving Multiple Sequence Alignment (MSA) problems using multi-objective metaheuristic algorithms to optimize alignment quality.

tools.name: pyMSA
tools.one_line_profile: Scoring multiple sequence alignments
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for calculating various scores and metrics for multiple sequence alignments, useful for evaluating alignment quality.

tools.name: revelio
tools.one_line_profile: Double-masking procedure for BS-seq alignments
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight utility for BS-seq and MethylC-seq data that applies a double-masking procedure on bisulfite alignments to facilitate variant calling.

tools.name: BuddySuite
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics toolkits for sequence and alignment manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of command-line tools for manipulating sequence files, alignments, and phylogenetic trees, designed for ease of use in pipelines.

tools.name: BioDownloader
tools.one_line_profile: Downloader for protein structures and MSAs
tools.detailed_description: A Command Line Tool for automating the downloading of protein structures, sequences, and multiple sequence alignments from biological databases.

tools.name: epitopefindr
tools.one_line_profile: Identify minimal overlap of aligning peptide regions
tools.detailed_description: An R package to BLAST peptide sequences against each other and identify the minimal overlap of aligning regions, useful for epitope mapping.

tools.name: bx-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for manipulating biological data and multiple sequence alignments
tools.detailed_description: A library containing various tools and scripts for manipulating biological data, particularly multiple sequence alignments (MAF, AXT, LAV formats). It is widely used in the Galaxy project ecosystem for genomic interval manipulation and alignment processing.

tools.name: EMMA
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble multiple sequence alignment tool for large datasets
tools.detailed_description: An ensemble method that utilizes MAFFT-linsi with the --add option to handle large datasets efficiently. It is designed to improve alignment accuracy and scalability for extensive biological sequence data.

tools.name: WITCH
tools.one_line_profile: Weighted HMM-based multiple sequence alignment method
tools.detailed_description: A multiple sequence alignment method that employs multiple weighted Hidden Markov Models (HMMs) to align unaligned sequences and identify consensus sequences, aiming to improve alignment quality through probabilistic modeling.

tools.name: T-Coffee
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive multiple sequence alignment package
tools.detailed_description: A widely used collection of tools for computing Multiple Sequence Alignments (MSA) of DNA, RNA, and protein sequences. It combines information from various sources (e.g., structure, other alignments) to improve accuracy.

tools.name: TAPER
tools.one_line_profile: Outlier detection for multiple sequence alignments
tools.detailed_description: A two-dimensional outlier detection algorithm designed to pinpoint errors in small species-specific stretches within multiple sequence alignments, helping to clean and improve MSA quality for downstream analysis.

tools.name: hs-blastn
tools.one_line_profile: Fast nucleotide-nucleotide sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: A high-speed nucleotide sequence aligner (hs-blastn) designed for fast and accurate alignment tasks, serving as an alternative to standard BLASTN for specific high-throughput scenarios.

tools.name: SparkBWA
tools.one_line_profile: Big Data accelerated Burrows-Wheeler Aligner
tools.detailed_description: A tool that leverages Apache Spark to parallelize and boost the performance of the Burrows-Wheeler Aligner (BWA), enabling efficient alignment of massive genomic datasets on distributed clusters.

tools.name: BioServices
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for accessing biological web services
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a programmatic interface to access various biological web services (e.g., UniProt, KEGG, NCBI), facilitating data retrieval and integration for bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: Shepherd-Score
tools.one_line_profile: Pharmacophoric interaction profile extraction and scoring
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ShEPhERD for the extraction, scoring, and alignment of pharmacophoric interaction profiles, used in drug discovery and molecular interaction analysis (ICLR 2025).

tools.name: PhyloCSF++
tools.one_line_profile: Fast calculation of PhyloCSF scores for genome alignments
tools.detailed_description: An efficient C++ implementation for computing PhyloCSF tracks for whole-genome multiple sequence alignments. It scores MSAs and annotates CDS features to assist in distinguishing protein-coding regions from non-coding ones using evolutionary signatures.

tools.name: streammd
tools.one_line_profile: Single-pass duplicate marking for alignments
tools.detailed_description: A tool for probabilistic duplicate marking of sequence alignments using a Bloom filter. It operates in a single pass, making it efficient for streaming data processing in bioinformatics pipelines.

tools.name: MView
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple sequence alignment reformatter and visualizer
tools.detailed_description: A utility that extracts, reformats, and visualizes the results of sequence database searches (BLAST, FASTA) or multiple sequence alignments, producing HTML or text output for easier interpretation.

tools.name: SuperCRUNCH
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic dataset construction and filtering pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics package for creating, filtering, and manipulating supermatrices and phylogenetic datasets from GenBank or local sequence data. It automates many steps in phylogenomic data preparation.

tools.name: performance
tools.one_line_profile: Assessment of regression models performance
tools.detailed_description: An R package to compute indices of model quality and goodness of fit (R2, ICC, AIC, BF, etc.). It provides a comprehensive suite of metrics for validating statistical models in scientific research.

tools.name: MASA-CUDAlign
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated DNA sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the MASA architecture that implements the Smith-Waterman/Needleman-Wunsch algorithms combined with Myers-Miller on NVIDIA GPUs. It is designed to align unrestricted size DNA sequences with high performance.

tools.name: MASA-Core
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Platform Architecture for Sequence Aligner framework
tools.detailed_description: A flexible software framework that simplifies the creation of DNA sequence alignment applications across multiple hardware/software platforms. It serves as the core infrastructure for tools like MASA-CUDAlign.

tools.name: vcf2phylip
tools.one_line_profile: VCF to phylogenetic format converter
tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert SNPs in VCF format to PHYLIP, NEXUS, binary NEXUS, or FASTA alignments. It facilitates the use of variant call data in phylogenetic analysis software.

tools.name: bamprofile
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment mismatch and gap profiler
tools.detailed_description: A utility to profile alignment mismatches and gaps from BAM files, useful for quality control and understanding error modes in sequencing data.

tools.name: wflign
tools.one_line_profile: WFA-guided ultralong tiling sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance sequence aligner designed for ultralong sequences, utilizing the Wavefront Alignment (WFA) algorithm to guide tiling and alignment.

tools.name: SINA
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-based multiple sequence alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: SINA (SILVA Incremental Aligner) is a reference-based multiple sequence alignment tool. It aligns rRNA gene sequences while maintaining high accuracy by considering secondary structure constraints, widely used in the SILVA project.

tools.name: AStarix
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and optimal sequence-to-graph aligner
tools.detailed_description: AStarix is a sequence-to-graph aligner that uses the A* algorithm to find optimal alignments. It is designed to align sequences to variation graphs efficiently.

tools.name: Goalign
tools.one_line_profile: Command line tools for manipulating multiple sequence alignments
tools.detailed_description: A set of command-line tools and a Go API for manipulating multiple sequence alignments (MSA). It supports various formats and operations like filtering, shuffling, and reformatting.

tools.name: imputePipe
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for genotype imputation and alignment
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for imputing genotypes to the 1000 Genomes reference panel. It handles alignment of target sequences to reference, haplotyping, imputation, and filtering, distributed via SGE.

tools.name: PanPA
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for building panproteome graphs and aligning sequences
tools.detailed_description: PanPA is a bioinformatics tool designed for constructing panproteome graphs and performing sequence alignment back to these graphs, facilitating pangenomic analysis.

tools.name: ncldv_markersearch
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic marker gene identification and alignment for giant viruses
tools.detailed_description: A tool specifically designed to identify phylogenetic marker genes in Nucleocytoviricota (giant viruses) and generate concatenated alignments for phylogenetic tree reconstruction.

tools.name: alignment
tools.one_line_profile: Simple Python library for multiple sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python library implementing algorithms for pairwise and multiple sequence alignment, suitable for educational purposes or simple alignment tasks.

tools.name: Patchwork
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-based retrieval and concatenation of phylogenetic markers
tools.detailed_description: A Julia-based tool for retrieving phylogenetic markers from whole genome sequence (WGS) data using alignment methods and concatenating them for downstream phylogenetic analysis.

tools.name: CSA
tools.one_line_profile: Cyclic DNA Sequence Aligner
tools.detailed_description: A C-based tool for aligning cyclic DNA sequences, addressing the specific challenge of circular permutations in sequence alignment.

tools.name: EquiMus
tools.one_line_profile: MuJoCo-based framework for musculoskeletal robot simulation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for energy-equivalent modeling and simulation of musculoskeletal robots using the MuJoCo physics engine, useful for biomechanics and robotics research.

tools.name: chromap
tools.one_line_profile: Fast alignment and preprocessing of chromatin profiles
tools.detailed_description: A highly efficient alignment tool optimized for chromatin profiles (e.g., ChIP-seq, ATAC-seq), providing fast mapping and preprocessing capabilities for epigenomic data.

tools.name: BiomolecularStructures.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics modules for biomolecular structures in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing modules for handling and analyzing biomolecular structures, suitable for structural biology and bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: PhyloAln
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-based tool to align sequences for phylogeny
tools.detailed_description: A convenient pipeline for aligning sequences and high-throughput reads based on reference sequences, specifically tailored for phylogenetic and evolutionary studies.

tools.name: clustalo
tools.one_line_profile: Clone of Clustal Omega multiple sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: A repository hosting the source code for Clustal Omega, a standard and widely used tool for scalable multiple sequence alignment of proteins.

tools.name: msasl-video-downloader
tools.one_line_profile: Downloader for MS-ASL sign language datasets
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool for downloading and managing videos from the MS-ASL (Microsoft American Sign Language) dataset, facilitating computer vision research in sign language recognition.

tools.name: pymuscle
tools.one_line_profile: Motor unit based model of skeletal muscle and fatigue
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for modeling skeletal muscle dynamics and fatigue based on motor units, useful for physiological simulations and biomechanics.

tools.name: trimal
tools.one_line_profile: Automated alignment trimming in large-scale phylogenetic analyses
tools.detailed_description: A widely used tool for the automated removal of poorly aligned regions from multiple sequence alignments, improving the quality of subsequent phylogenetic analyses.

tools.name: make_prg
tools.one_line_profile: Create a Population Reference Graph from MSA
tools.detailed_description: A tool to construct a Population Reference Graph (PRG) from a Multiple Sequence Alignment (MSA), enabling graph-based genomic analyses.

tools.name: EPSAPG
tools.one_line_profile: Extensive Protein Sequence Alignment Profiles Generator
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline combining MMseqs2 and PSI-BLAST to generate extensive protein sequence alignment profiles, useful for homology detection and structure prediction.

tools.name: SPOT-1D-LM
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structural property prediction using language models
tools.detailed_description: A method for predicting protein secondary and tertiary structural properties using language models, achieving high accuracy without requiring multiple sequence alignments.

tools.name: alignparse
tools.one_line_profile: Align sequences and parse features for deep mutational scanning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to align sequencing reads (often from deep mutational scanning experiments) to a reference and parse specific features or mutations.

tools.name: centrolign
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple sequence alignment of long tandem repeats
tools.detailed_description: A specialized aligner for generating multiple sequence alignments of long tandem repeats, such as those found in centromeres.

tools.name: apc
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for testing and trimming circular DNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: A Perl script to test DNA sequences for overlapping ends (circularity), trim the overlap, and verify the join by aligning reads, useful for circular genome assembly.

tools.name: scrambler
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Generative Masking for biological sequence interpretation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for interpreting deep learning models trained on biological sequences using Deep Generative Masking to identify important sequence motifs.

tools.name: MSAexplorer
tools.one_line_profile: Graphing library and app for plotting multiple sequence alignments
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and web application for visualizing multiple sequence alignments (MSA) interactively, aiding in the exploration of sequence conservation and variation.

tools.name: fixed-wing-sim
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation of fixed-wing unmanned aerial glider dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation for simulating the non-linear dynamics of fixed-wing gliders, including aerodynamic coefficient calculation and trim state analysis.

tools.name: SAMsift
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced filtering and tagging of SAM/BAM alignments using Python expressions
tools.detailed_description: A tool for filtering and tagging SAM/BAM alignment files based on Python expressions, allowing for flexible and complex criteria to be applied to genomic alignment data.

tools.name: GeneDoc
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple Sequence Alignment Editor and shading utility
tools.detailed_description: A full-featured editor for manipulating and visualizing multiple sequence alignments (MSA), useful for manual refinement and preparation of publication-quality figures.

tools.name: CrossFilt
tools.one_line_profile: Filtering tools to remove alignment and annotation bias in cross-species comparisons
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools designed to filter sequencing reads to mitigate biases arising from alignment and annotation errors during cross-species genomic comparisons.

tools.name: cfml-maskrc
tools.one_line_profile: Masks recombinant regions in alignments based on ClonalFrameML output
tools.detailed_description: A utility to mask regions identified as recombinant by ClonalFrameML in nucleotide alignments, improving the accuracy of downstream phylogenetic inference.

tools.name: contig-puller
tools.one_line_profile: Extracts and aligns contigs harbouring a target gene from assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A tool to search assembly files for specific target genes, extract the relevant contigs, and perform alignment around the target sequence for comparative analysis.

tools.name: fa-mask
tools.one_line_profile: Masks specified regions in FASTA sequences
tools.detailed_description: A simple utility for masking specific genomic regions in FASTA files, often used to exclude low-quality or repetitive regions from analysis.

tools.name: MetaLogo
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneity-aware sequence logo generator and aligner
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating sequence logos that accounts for sequence heterogeneity, including alignment capabilities to visualize consensus and variation in multiple sequences.

tools.name: remy
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of nucleotide alignment algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool written in TypeScript to visualize how nucleotide alignment algorithms work, taking DNA sequences as input and showing the best alignment match.

tools.name: lastz
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise DNA sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: A widely used pairwise sequence aligner designed for aligning DNA sequences, often used for whole-genome alignment and comparative genomics.

tools.name: ProgressiveAligner.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Progressive alignment scripts for protein sequences
tools.detailed_description: A Julia implementation of progressive alignment algorithms for protein sequences, facilitating multiple sequence alignment construction.

tools.name: minimap2
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile pairwise aligner for genomic and spliced nucleotide sequences
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose alignment program for mapping DNA or long mRNA sequences against a large reference database, optimized for long reads (PacBio/Nanopore) and assembly-to-assembly alignment.

tools.name: fivepseq
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of 5′ endpoints distribution in RNA sequencing datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing the distribution of 5' endpoints in RNA-seq data (e.g., 5PSeq, PARE-seq, ribosome profiling) to study translation dynamics and RNA degradation.

tools.name: msaconverter
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to convert multiple sequence alignments into different formats
tools.detailed_description: A utility based on Biopython to convert multiple sequence alignment (MSA) files between various standard formats (e.g., FASTA, PHYLIP, NEXUS).

tools.name: MARS
tools.one_line_profile: Improving Multiple circular sequence Alignment using Refined Sequences
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to improve multiple sequence alignments specifically for circular sequences (like mitochondrial genomes or plasmids) by refining sequences.

tools.name: komplexity
tools.one_line_profile: K-mer-based approach for masking low-complexity nucleotide sequences
tools.detailed_description: A fast tool for masking low-complexity regions in nucleotide sequences using k-mer analysis, useful for preprocessing before alignment or assembly.

tools.name: MSEABOARD
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based dashboard for visualization and analysis of MSAs and phylogenetic trees
tools.detailed_description: An interactive web dashboard for visualizing multiple sequence alignments, phylogenetic trees, protein structures, and distance matrices.

tools.name: codon_alignment
tools.one_line_profile: Codon-based alignment for CDS sequences
tools.detailed_description: A Perl script/tool to perform codon-aware alignment of coding DNA sequences (CDS), preserving the reading frame during alignment.

tools.name: HAlign-3
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate multiple nucleotide sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A multiple sequence alignment tool optimized for speed and accuracy when handling nucleotide sequences, part of the HAlign series.

tools.name: MashMap
tools.one_line_profile: Fast approximate aligner for long DNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm for fast approximate alignment of long DNA sequences, computing local alignment boundaries and identity estimates without full base-level alignment.

tools.name: Parsnp
tools.one_line_profile: Core genome alignment and SNP calling for bacteria
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rapid core genome alignment and SNP calling for bacterial genomes, capable of handling hundreds to thousands of genomes and reconstructing core genome phylogeny.

tools.name: AMAS
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment Manipulation and Summary
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for calculating summary statistics of multiple sequence alignments (MSA) and performing manipulations like concatenation, splitting, and format conversion.

tools.name: Mapper
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic sequence aligner
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based tool for aligning genomic sequences.

tools.name: App-SpaM
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-free Phylogenetic Placement using filtered SPAced word Matches
tools.detailed_description: A tool for alignment-free phylogenetic placement of sequences using filtered spaced word matches, offering an alternative to traditional alignment-based methods.

tools.name: QuickEd
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance exact sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance tool for exact sequence alignment based on the bound-and-align paradigm.

tools.name: WES
tools.one_line_profile: Whole Exome Sequencing end-to-end pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) data analysis, covering QC, adapter trimming, alignment, validation, recalibration, and variant calling.

tools.name: HAlign-4
tools.one_line_profile: Strategy for rapidly aligning millions of sequences
tools.detailed_description: The fourth version of the HAlign tool, designed for the rapid multiple sequence alignment of very large datasets containing millions of sequences.

tools.name: QMRITools
tools.one_line_profile: Processing and visualization tools for quantitative MRI data
tools.detailed_description: A Mathematica package providing a collection of tools for the processing, analysis, and visualization of quantitative Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) data.

tools.name: rMSA
tools.one_line_profile: R interface to popular Multiple Sequence Alignment tools
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to run several popular multiple sequence alignment tools (like ClustalW, MAFFT, MUSCLE, Kalign) directly from R.

tools.name: PhyloCSF
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic analysis tool for identifying conserved protein-coding regions
tools.detailed_description: PhyloCSF (Phylogenetic Codon Substitution Frequencies) examines multi-species genome sequence alignments to identify conserved protein-coding regions using a statistical comparison of phylogenetic codon models.

tools.name: EvoClustRNA
tools.one_line_profile: RNA 3D structure prediction using evolutionary constraints
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting RNA 3D structures by leveraging co-evolutionary information derived from multiple sequence alignments (MSA) to guide the folding process.

tools.name: CONSENT

tools.detailed_description: CONSENT (COrrection of loNg reads with SEquence alignmeNT) is a tool for self-correction of long reads and assembly polishing, utilizing multiple sequence alignment to improve data quality.

tools.name: pyMSAviz
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for Multiple Sequence Alignment visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for the visualization of Multiple Sequence Alignment (MSA) data, supporting various formats and customizable plotting options for sequence analysis.

tools.name: multiz

tools.detailed_description: The official version of Multiz from Penn State's Miller Lab, a component of the TBA (Threaded Blockset Aligner) package, widely used for aligning massive genomic sequences (e.g., in UCSC Genome Browser).

tools.name: pychopper
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to identify, orient, and trim Nanopore cDNA reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool specifically designed for processing Nanopore cDNA sequencing data. It identifies full-length cDNA reads, orients them correctly, and trims primers/adapters to rescue usable sequences.

tools.name: Nextclade
tools.one_line_profile: Viral genome alignment, mutation calling, and phylogenetic placement
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive tool for viral genome analysis that performs pairwise alignment to a reference, calls mutations, assigns clades, performs quality checks, and places sequences on a phylogenetic tree.

tools.name: nf-core/cageseq

tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the analysis of CAGE (Cap Analysis of Gene Expression) sequencing data, including steps for trimming, alignment, and tag counting.

tools.name: nf-core/multiplesequencealign

tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking pipeline designed to run and systematically evaluate various Multiple Sequence Alignment (MSA) tools and methods, facilitating comparative analysis.

tools.name: ViralMSA

tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly tool for performing reference-guided multiple sequence alignment of large numbers of viral genomes, optimized for speed and scalability.

tools.name: Metalign

tools.name: muscle_model

tools.name: SpeedPPI

tools.name: TreeSub

tools.name: cnp-align

tools.name: IPP

tools.name: Kmasker

tools.name: PyPythia

tools.name: samclip

tools.name: wffilter

tools.name: pdbcolor

tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to map information from multiple sequence alignments (such as conservation scores) onto PDB protein structures for visualization.

tools.name: bevel

tools.name: PhyLim

tools.name: JPP

tools.name: LinguaPhylo

tools.name: WhereDoGGo

tools.name: MrBayes

tools.name: MLLPT

tools.name: Whale.jl

tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for Bayesian gene tree reconciliation and Whole Genome Duplication (WGD) inference using Amalgamated Likelihood Estimation (ALE).

tools.name: mutree

tools.name: PhylogenomicsPipelines

tools.name: BEAST

tools.name: resampling

tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing functions for statistical resampling methods, including jackknife and bootstrap, which are commonly used for error estimation in scientific data analysis.

tools.name: bnkit

tools.name: PIQMEE

tools.name: delphy

tools.name: TreeMix-Pipeline

tools.name: dna_stats_app

tools.name: VeryFastTree

tools.name: clockor2
